page.title: 02Where Boundaries Meet.
page.content: An unusual feature of the area is that at the White Leaved Oak hamlet on the edge of Chase End Hill several county and parish boundaries meet.The area is bisected by Hereford/Worcester and Gloucestershire and before the boundary changes the three counties met at White Leaved Oak.This is also the meeting place of five parish boundaries namely:-Bromesberrow, Berrow,Eastnor,Castle Morton and Birtsmorton.The Parliamentary Divisions of North Gloucestershire and Leominster serve the area,they are separated by the county boundaries.
